description:
A chocobo is an adventurer's best friend!

With the new Buddy System, you can take a chocobo buddy with you on your adventure. 
Invite Dark Knight and begin your journey now!

[Ability]
Dark Blade：Use the legendary power of the Dark Knight's blade to sacrifice HP, deal Dark damage to a foe 1 tile ahead of you, and knock them back.
name: Buddy Chocobo “Dark Knight”
